title: Push
description: An instance of pushing code to a vcs.

id.description: The unique ID of this Push

self.description: The canonical URI for this record

repository.description: The `self` URI of the Repository, or a nested Repository record.

branchName.description: The branch name associated with the Push

commitOid.description: The oid of the Commit this Push is associated with.

previousCommitOid.description: The oid of the previous Commit this Push is associated with.

updatedAt.description: The time this Push was last updated.
